content: If a Nevada voter plans to vote in person, does the voter need to sign and return the mailed form with their signature?
Many folks on the climate phonebank wondering this and we would appreciate any support!
Please direct them to https://iwillvote.com/ for these types of questions. They will be able to look up the regulations in their specific state/county.
Also check out https://www.vote411.org/nevada#vote-by-mail it looks like, according to this website, that the mailed form is only for voting by mail.
